results.title: Short poppies 2
results.brief_description: Short poppies is a competitive film and video festival open to university and college students from around the world. This collection of ten productions has been selected from the second festival which opened at Kinselas night club in Sydney on July 7th 1994. The films were judged by a panel of filmmakers, critics and students and award winning work then toured around Australia to all capital cities. The short films included originate from Canada, Australia, United Kingdom and Germany, the titles of which are: “Rokadeus”, “The stranger”, “Bear in mind, “Memory snares”, “Bete noire”, “Talk show”, “Pet”, “Schlaraffenland”, “Miss Dudevant’s hand”, and “Beatrix and Marvin”.

results.title: Short play showcase: The New tenant
results.creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and Larry Yust
results.brief_description: Eugene Ionesco’s play “The New tenant”, is a classic example of Theatre of the Absurd. The play expresses Ionesco’s sense of the ambiguity and incoherence of much of modern life, especially big-city life. Cast includes Paul Schumacher, Eve McVeagh, Carl Byrd, John Crawford.

results.title: Short orders
results.creator_credit: Hal Roach Studios, Hal Roach and Percy Pembroke
results.brief_description: Stan Laurel stars in this silent film as a harried waiter who must deal with customers who have issues with the quality of the food and service in the restaurant. Various comic situations arise. Cast: Stan Laurel, Marie Mosquini, Eddie Baker, Jack Ackroyd, Mark Jones, George Rowe

results.title: Short history = Scurta istorie
results.creator_credit: Studioul Cinematografic Bucuresti and Ion Popescu Gopo
results.brief_description: Using animation techniques presents a complete history of mankind from the birth of the Earth, showing man as a descendant of an ape. Taking with him everywhere a symbolic flower he explores the planet, optimistically considering life under water, and eventually, life on other planets of the cosmos.

results.title: Short distance runner
results.creator_credit: Burt Martin Associates and Charles Davis

results.title: Short cuts. Magic movie screens: from vacuum cleaning to Plumper's dance party
results.brief_description:
This is a compilation tape of animations produced by
disabled artists working with a mentor. “Short cuts”
features 30 seconds to 1 minute duration animation pieces and “Magic movie screens…” features slightly longer animated works of up to 5 minutes in length. The artists include Shirley Warke, Jimmy Fuller, Terry Williams,
Dorothy Berry, Cathy Staughton, Anne Lynch, John Northe, Fiona Longhurst, Alan Constable, Valerio Ciccone, Monica Burns, Tim Williams. Curated by Arts Project Australia with the support from Council of Adult, Community and Further Education, (Northern Metro Region).

results.title: Short cuts [Widescreen]
results.creator_credit: Short Cuts Productions Inc, Cary Brokaw and Robert Altman
results.brief_description: A dazzling and dizzying adaptation of short stories by Raymond Carver, “Short Cuts” follows 22 Los Angeles residents whose lives intersect over the course of a few days. Anne and Howard Finnegan are preparing for their son’s birthday when the boy falls into a coma after a car accident. Meanwhile, Andy the baker, seethes with anger over the birthday cake that wasn’t claimed. Lois is a new mother who watches over her baby when not making money doing phone sex. Pilot “Stormy” Weathers takes a very literal approach to dividing up property with his ex-wife. Doreen is trying to hold on to her marriage with Earl, who is a good man on the rare occasions that he’s sober. Zoe, a classical musician, is trying to find a way to connect with her jazz singer mother. Dr. Ralph Wyman and wife, Marian, put their bickering on hold while they have dinner with couple, Stuart and Claire Kane. The stories wind around each other with just enough connecting threads to hold the tapestry together. Cast includes: Anne Archer, Bruce Davison, Peter Gallagher, Buck Henry, Jennifer Jason Leigh, Jack Lemmon, Huey Lewis, Lyle Lovett, Andie MacDowell, Matthew Modine, Julianne Moore, Chris Penn, Tim Robbins, Annie Ross, Lori Singer, Madeleine Stowe, Lili Tomlin, Tom Waits, Fred Ward, Lili Taylor, Frances McDormand and Robert Downey Jr.

results.title: Short and suite
results.creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Norman McLaren and Evelyn Lambart
results.brief_description: A colour cocktail by Norman McLaren and Evelyn Lambart, translating into moving patterns of colour and light the moods of music written for a jazz ensemble by Eldon Rathburn. Inscribed and coloured directly on film. (Awards: Venice; Bergamo.)

results.title: Shores of Gulf St Vincent
results.brief_description: Marine life of the reefs at 80, 60 and 30 foot depths representing submerged shorelines in St. Vincent Gulf, South Australia. Shows the dense population and variety of populations found in these temperate waters.
